(41911, 45146).label: location
(41911, 45146).description: A specific location in the tropical Pacific Ocean where the TOGA-COARE experiment was conducted

(41911, 45146).name: tropical Pacific Ocean
(41911, 45146).label: location
(41911, 45146).description: A region of the Pacific Ocean located near the equator, known for its significant role in global climate variability

(41911, 45146).name: GCMs
(41911, 45146).label: model
(41911, 45146).description: General Circulation Models, a type of climate model used for simulating the Earth's climate system

(41911, 45146).name: ARM
(41911, 45146).label: project
(41911, 45146).description: The Atmospheric Radiation Measurement program, a research initiative focused on understanding the role of clouds and radiation in the Earth's climate system

(41911, 45146).name: decadal climate simulation
(41911, 45146).label: experiment
(41911, 45146).description: A type of climate simulation that spans multiple decades, used for studying long-term climate variability and change

(41911, 45146).name: precipitations
(41911, 45146).label: variable

(41911, 45146).name: TOGA-COARE period
(41911, 45146).label: experiment

(44633, 47843).name: CRM
(44633, 47843).label: model

(44633, 47843).name: GCM
(44633, 47843).label: model

(44633, 47843).label: model

(44633, 47843).label: model

(44633, 47843).name: reanalysis data
(44633, 47843).label: dataset
(44633, 47843).description: A type of dataset that combines historical observations and model simulations to provide a consistent and comprehensive record of past climate conditions

(44633, 47843).name: weather prediction

(44633, 47843).description: The use of climate and weather models to forecast future weather conditions

(44633, 47843).name: adaptation

(44633, 47843).name: location
